1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Han Ji Hoon offers information concerning past crimes and mental illness among Gong Soon Ho's family members. An associate is asked to take Byung Jung away so Han Ji Hoon cannot bring him into the investigation.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: The family argues about a lottery ticket and the problems it could create for their business. Kim In Sook begins the plan to bother Gong Soon Ho and her family.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: A risque video appears online and Gong Soon Ho asks to see it on her personal computer. An investigation team checks the family's house and department store for spy bugs.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: The family talks about an online video as well as unfavorable rumors started by a recent article. Han Ji Hoon has classified papers confiscated and all methods of communication are blocked.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Kim In Sook joins a panel but a friend helps her deflect unwanted questions. A news reporter asks for an interview with Han Ji Hoon and Kim In Sook but Gong Soon Ho asks to see the article before it is released.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: This is the concluding episode to Legend of the Comrades. Sergeant Lee meets Lee Sugyeong in the battlefield for the last time.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Kim In Sook is threatened by her sister-in-law and she addresses the bugging of a Dealain company official. Gong Soon Ho questions Kim In Sook about her plans for revenge.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Uhm Ki Do finds blood on a phone but Kim In Sook worries about the outcome. Kim In Sook is told to immediately resume a meeting or the entire plan will be ruined.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: A man is found dead and some people worry that Ji Hoon may be involved with the murder. The investigation continues and a teddy bear the victim was holding is an important clue.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Chung Gi is asked to put restrictions on Kang Mi Ja's ability to leave the country. Kim In Sook thinks she has found an ally at JK Gardens after meeting with her eldest sister-in-law.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: A video is found that shows the murdered boy speaking to Kim In Sook. Im Yoon Seo begins to worry that a divorce could ruin her place in the company.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Ji Hoon's mother is found in the hospital and she hopes to be reunited with her son. Gong Soon Ho asks Uhm Ki Do to spy on Kim In Sook.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Kim In Sook tells Gong Soon Ho about Dong Ho and her attempts to leave him. Ji Hoon says that he believes that Kim In Sook will continue their plans.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Ji Hoon has doubts about the identity of Johnny's murderer as his associate asks for evidence. Jo Dong Jin's wife is upset to learn that Uhm Ki Do is dead.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Mrs. Uhm calls her son Dong Jin and asks if he has the girl. She tells him not to harm her at all. Jo Hoon is in a meeting with Mrs. Uhm and family. He has a disc of information that he will distribute to investigators if his demands are not met.

imdb.plot outline: For 18 years Kim In Sook has been ignored and never regarded as sister-in-law by her husband's brother and sisters. She's been isolated by everybody in her husband's family and she lived like an invisible person. Then things got worse when her husband died in a helicopter crash. Since then, her mother-in-law tried to deprive her of her guardianship of her son. Then Han Ji Hoon, who had a relationship with her in the past appeared as the lawyer of JK clan. And he witnessed her miserable situation. Then he decides to help her and resets his goal in life. That is, to turn In Sook, a woman who has been treated as rubbish into a Queen. Ji Hoon leads a double life in JK clan, and makes arduous effort for the goal of saving In Sook. He finds that his feelings toward In Sook are more than gratitude and pity. She has become the only woman who makes his heart beat fast. It's just an untutored feeling. And he could abandon it just for the sake of In Sook. the story of Kim In Sook's battle against all odds to rise to the top of JK Group with the help of the lawyer Han Ji Hoon, a man who has supported her since they were children.
imdb.title: Royal Family
